metadata.inclusion: Turn the primary controller of Z-Wave network into inclusion mode, short press the product’s Z-Wave button that you can find in the back of the product
metadata.exclusion: Turn the primary controller of Z-Wave network into exclusion mode, short press the product’s Z-Wave button that you can find in back of the product
metadata.reset: Press and hold the Z-Wave button that you can find in back of the product for 20 seconds and then release. This procedure should only be used when the primary controller is inoperable

values.propertyName: Wake Device for 10 minutes After Power On

metadata.label: Wake Device for 10 minutes After Power On

values.propertyName: Motion Sensor Report Type to Send

metadata.label: Motion Sensor Report Type to Send

metadata.description: Report only when the defined threshold is exceeded
metadata.label: Selective Reporting

metadata.description: Defines the difference below or above the upper/lower limit after which the limit is reenabled
metadata.label: Temperature Recover Limit

states.1: Resets all configuration parameters to default setting
states.1431655765: Reset the product to factory default setting and exclude from Z-Wave network
